label.blockValueChangeIgnore: block unless value changes (ignore initial value)
label.blockValueChangeGreaterEqual: block unless value change is greater or equal
label.blockValueChangeGreater: block unless value change is greater than
label.blockIfValueChangeGreaterEqual: block if value change is greater or equal to
label.blockIfValueChangeGreater: block if value change is greater than
label.lastOutput: compared to last valid output value
label.startValue: leave empty to use first data received
